entry.title: Boyfriend(s).
entry.summary:
Author: Ababluebe

Summary: Damian knew he was right. And it wasn't just his usual smugness speaking up. He had good reason to believe that his brothers didn't look at him with the brotherly affection that siblings had.At least not only that. But it definitely wasn't the same way Duke looked at him. Or Cassandra, even Stephanie and Barbara. Their eyes came softly. Little promises from time to time. Sweet, immaculate things like'I'll be here for you when you need me.' 'Count me in if you want anything.' 'I would never let anyone be mean to you.'No, the way Dick, Tim and Jason looked at him was similar in essence, but very, very unequal in proportion. The message that came with their actions made him shudder in the middle of the night. Great oaths.'I'll never let you go far away again.' 'I'll always be around.' 'No one will ever screw with you and get away with it.'

entry.title: All the masks.
entry.summary:
Author: Ababluebe

Summary: Damian knew that when he chose that life -following his father's legacy as a vigilante- he would encounter many obstacles.But between reconciling his second identity with his new position as heir to the Wayne company and all the problems that came with the role, he didn't expect that his greatest difficulty would be avoiding the brazen interest of three rising villains in his person.
